comments:
Build: 3.3 M7

I am seeing this NPE in the log when clicking on ""Show extension point description" in the Extension Points tab of the manifest editor. I get the same NPE when clicking "Preview Reference Document" in the extension point scheme editor.

I will attach a patch for 3.3.1.
John, do you have any reproducable steps?  Or possibly a project which always fails?  I can fix the NPE but would like to see if we can figure out if there is more we can do.

The code was assuming the presence of the platform.doc.isv plug-in in the installation.

This plug-in can be missing in some products, and we should guard against that.
Patch released in HEAD and in the 3.3 maintenance branch.
*** Bug 202860 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
